thread.title: Johnny Depp flashes gold teeth at London Film festival appearance
thread.title_full: Johnny Depp flashes gold teeth at London Film festival appearance | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Johnny Depp flashes gold teeth at London Film festival appearance
text:
Hollywood superstar Johnny Depp flashed his gold and seemingly stained teeth at the Virgin Atlantic Gala screening of “Black Mass”.
Depp, 52, stepped out during the BFI London Film Festival at Odeon’s Leicester Square with wife Amber Heard and beamed with happiness, giving everyone a look at his mouth bling, reported Daily Mirror.
Depp’s wife Amber Heard came out to support him at the premiere of his latest movie. While the blonde stunner looked incredible as she walked down the red carpet in a black satin dress and heels, Depp simply could not get enough of a reporter’s microphone muffler.
The Hollywood hunk, wearing all black, looked to be having a whale of a time as he carefully caressed the object while chatting to journalists.
 10:57 am
